original_text: This letter is from me, Paul. I am an apostle of Christ Jesus. God, our Saviour, is the one who commanded that I should be an apostle. So did Christ Jesus, the one that we trust to help us. Timothy Introduction Timothy 2
korean_text: 우리 구주 하나님과 우리의 소망이신 그리스도 예수의 명령을 따라 그리스도 예수의 사도 된 바울은

sentences.original_text: This letter is from me, Paul.
sentences.korean_translation: 이 편지는 나 바울로부터 온 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: I am an apostle of Christ Jesus.
God, our Saviour, is the one who commanded
that I should be an apostle.
So did Christ Jesus, the one that we trust
